Pre-Game Insights: Rahul Tripathi would be keen to finally shed his passenger's tag at his home ground as Sanju Samson is ruled out of the series after getting injured in the first match in Mumbai.
Others: Jitesh Sharma to join squad as Sanju's replacement
Vidarbha wicketkeeper-batter Jitesh Sharma has been called as Samson's replacement and will join the team in Pune
While Tripathi will be a slot-specific replacement, another local player vying for inclusion is top-order batter Ruturaj Gaikwad
Gaikwad's experience of playing at the Gahunje ground could be a thing of discussion
India and Sri Lanka have both won one game each at this venue
